meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by my Philosophy course and uncertain about my future after college
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Melanie, a first-year majoring in Philosophy. I’ve taken a few classes so far and am really enjoying the content, but I’m also feeling really stressed out. I’ve been working on a lot of papers, and some of them are really challenging and require a lot of thinking. I’m worried that I won’t be able to handle college-level work, and I’m starting to feel like I’m not measuring up. I also feel a little bit over overwhelmed by all the academic expectations for college students, especially since I’m not really sure what my major even means anymore. I’d love to talk about how to manage my academic load, deal with stress, and figure out if Philosophy is even a good fit for me.
